Purpose: To analyze specimens for Fragile X screening and follow-up testing, providing accurate and reliable results on CGG repeat expansions.
Container: EDTA blood collection tube or buccal swab collection kit
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, capillary electrophoresis system, Fragile X PCR kit, DNA extraction kit, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator, gel documentation system, micropipettes, vortex mixer, microcentrifuge
